Starting point: The beginning of bolus shape change propelled by the tongue
Ending point: Arrival of the bolus tail at the fauces

Starting point: Bolus head passing the ramus of the mandible
First contact of the inferior surface of the epiglottis and the arytenoids
Ending point: Last contact of the inferior surface of the epiglottis and the arytenoids
Bolus tail passing through UES and offset of UES opening

Starting point: Onset of hyoid bone movement burst
